attributes.action: Debate the integrity of the Referendum decision on account of misleading claims.
attributes.background: In the Referendum the British people were confronted with many misleading claims. Consequently, the will of the British people is not fully recognised in the final decision. The integrity of the democratic process has been compromised.

rejection.details:
If you want a parliamentary inquiry into the referendum campaign, you could sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/146016
